q: Why is AWS more economical than traditional data centers for applications with varying compute workloads?

choices.a: Amazon EC2 costs are billed on a monthly basis.
choices.b: Users retain full administrative access to their Amazon EC2 instances.
choices.c: Amazon EC2 instances can be launched on demand when needed.
choices.d: Users can permanently run enough instances to handle peak workloads.
